Sugar üçé

> Provides syntax sugar macros

-> Macro

"/home" -> any:
  # at any HTTP method
  return "Hello, world!"

Imports

../core/exceptions

Consts

sugarRoutes = r"HappyXSugarRoutes"

Macros

macro `->`(route, at, body: untyped): untyped

Syntax sugar for routing

For SPA you can use:

"/route" -> build:
  ...

For SSR you can use:

"/route" -> any:
  ...
"/otherRoute" -> get:
  ...

Example:

"/syntaxSugar" -> get:
  return "Hello, world"
